content.raw:
![Screen Shot 2016-02-11 at 10.05.05 AM.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/236155218-Screen_Shot_2016-02-11_at_10.05.05_AM.png)

Let's try these colors. Each individual pill will be the darker blue, as well as each multi-pill container. Only variables within the multi-pill container will be the lighter color. 
If a variable within a multi-pill is dragged out onto its own, it turns dark blue.
content.html: Let's try these colors. Each individual pill will be the darker blue, as well as each multi-pill container. Only variables within the multi-pill container will be the lighter color. If a variable within a multi-pill is dragged out onto its own, it turns dark blue.
